step_data.thought: I have successfully found the shortest walking route from Times Square to Central Park. The directions are displayed along with the distance and estimated time. I can now send a message to the user confirming that the route has been found.
step_data.action: stop('The shortest walking route from Times Square to Central Park has been found. The distance is 3.6km with an estimated time of 49 minutes.')
